resources.string: Unfortunately Cafydia has stopped. Sending the report you will improve the application for next releases.

Cafydia.org - Madrid - Spain - contact@cafydia.org
I have read the End User License Agreement and I accept it
Finished. This reflects the basal doses that I administer to me in the whole day. (If not use basal insulin leave all empty)

Activating this options Cafydia will correct all deviations of the glucose before meals automatically.\n\nIf used, it is a must that in previous step you enter correctly the basal doses you use in order to Cafydia properly calculate your Correction Factor
Activated Cafydia starts in tutorial mode where it will be explained each activity in a simple and brief manner. It\'s recommended
You can reinitialize the Tutorial Mode from the settings menu of Cafydia in every moment

Know that it\'s needed to introduce two different meals for each breakfast, lunch and dinner with glucoses before and after each meal for Cafydia to start generating recommendations.\n\nDon\'t worry about to give correct doses at the start because this doses will be corrected automatically.
Functions not generated yet. Please, add more meals
Very well! Your glucose levels are excellent
Your glucose levels are close to perfect. Even so, try to improve a little more!
Your glucose levels are not the desired. Try to make adjustments. Much Courage!
Your glucose levels becoming worrisome. Need to make changes
Your glucose levels are alarming. Visit your doctor
There is no data yet. Try adding a new glucose test

Nice to welcome Cafydia.

Cafydia will help you generating recommendations about administering insulin for each meal, and also will help you knowing about your diabetes, you will see how your body responds to insulin administered, what HbA1c levels will be getting, etc.

For more information visit:

http://www.cafydia.org/

For any suggestions you may wish do write me an email at the address:

mcollado@cafydia.org

Miguel Collado

Cafydia stands for Computerized Assistant For Your Diabetes.

This is the result of a personal project fruit of research and analysis, in which all the tools that might be needed to accurately predict what dose of insulin administered in a given meal are implemented.

This project would never have come to light without the invaluable guide of Daniel Hernández Cassel, nor the brainstormings, patience and wise advices of Maria Teresa Ortube Valbuena. Thank you!

Miguel Collado
You can\'t add glucose tests in the future!
The Strict Mode is activated and meal is not in range
Notification in two hours to add a glucose test
Notification in hour and 45 minutes to add a glucose test
Notification in hour and a half to add a glucose test
You must specify manually the dose
Do you really want to save the changes to the baseline? This will change all the recommendations about the meal selected
If you proceed you will establish a minimum dose for preprandial in the current meal. This will be the minimum dose recommended, if the sum of the baseline and modifiers are below of such minimum.
To validate the Baseline it\'s needed two meals with a difference of 30gr / 1.05oz / 0.066lb of carbohydrates between them and two glucose readings before and after each one.
Two breakfasts in midweek and its glucose readings
Two breakfasts in weekend and its glucose readings
Two lunches in midweek and its glucose readings
Two lunches in weekend and its glucose readings
Two dinners in midweek and its glucose readings
Two dinners in weekend and its glucose readings
Do you want to finish selecting food for the snack?
You have not yet specified the amount of carbohydrates
Do you want to finish adding the complex food to the database?

All glucose test deviation from 100mg/dL / 5.5mmol/L before meals will be corrected. Attention!, is imperative that the insulin used as basal insulin, if used, be properly introduced in the baseline menu.
If the meal is out of range Cafydia Diabetes won\'t permit you to introduce the meal
You will be notified of the missing minutes to get to the range, or if you are in it, the minutes remaining until the end
You will be notified ten minutes before a meal will exceed the hour limit of the range
This will add a new label in case that isn\'t exists and add the date range of the programmed Metabolic Rhythm being deactivated. This not apply to manual deactivation
New date range was added to label
Show function parameters on baseline chart
Hide sections that no offer modification on meals
This will remove the Metabolic Rhythm and also everything associated with it, like correctives, beginnings, schedules, etc
The range of dates selected is in use for Metabolic Rhythm
Cannot disable Metabolic Rhythm. The current it\'s scheduled and applies
To be able to see the progression, still need
You cannot change or remove the first page
The new page was added at the end
This will delete all annotations whose scope applies only on this page and all graphics on it.
Do you want to add the following annotation?
Do you want to add the following label?
The label was not saved. Save it first.
Are you sure to delete the annotation selected?
Are you sure to delete the label and all the date ranges that it contains?
Are you sure to delete the chart page element selected?
Are you sure to delete the date range selected?
This reset the app and activate the tutorial mode in Cafydia
This reset the app and activate the tutorial mode in Cafydia. Are you sure?
Select the meal or snack you wish to take
In meals, here you have the food panel
And this is the recommendation details panel
The final recommendation will be displayed here
Don\'t forget to finish saving the meal for later analysis and reporting
In snacks, only the food panel is shown
You can establish the amount of carbohydrates do you want to eat. It will be memorized
When selecting food, all the amount of carbohydrates left will be filled with the selected food
If you don\'t want to use only one food, correct reducing its weight and select the following food
Always all the amount of carbohydrates left will be filled with the following food selected
In the food panel you will find four tabs which are:
Move between them dragging your finger horizontally
And important thing to know is that when editing food, if you specify the weight of one unit of the food being edited you never will be queried about weight, but units
You can see the initial dose provided by the baseline and all modifiers applied below
You can change the last preprandial dose generated by Cafydia or manually entered by you
You can establish a minimum preprandial dose, that is, the initial Baseline dose plus modifiers never can be below this value
You can modify the recommendation modifying the linear function:

Metabolic Rhythms are configurations that solve the problem we have at certain times in which we need more or less insulin than usual. And also, that needs may grow or decrease with the passage of time
By default exists a Metabolic Rhythm called Default, It\'s for daily use. You can add more. (for holidays, etc)
In Beginnings you can establish how the doses will be modified over time since the Metabolic Rhythm activation
In Correctives you can add special modifiers that will alter the doses instantly when activated in the meal menu, like running, walking, etc
In this activity you can add Complex Foods to the food panel. What means Complex Food in Cafydia?
Complex Food is a special food constituted by more foods

If you want to cook rice with meat, select the amount of rice from the Food Panel and weight all the resultant cooked food. Cafydia will calculate the carbohydrate percentage and will let you to add this Complex Food to be used later in meals menu or to compound new complex foods
And this is the food selected panel
A long click on each of the beginning views permits you to add or delete dots in it
Define how do you want to be modified each insulin over time

An important thing is the following: Default Metabolic Rhythm is for your daily use, so every modification should converge on 0. In Default Metabolic Rhythm you cannot change the dots in terms of its modification but yes of its days. To change the dots modification try to add new Metabolic Rhythms
If going to run or walk makes you to need less insulin than normally, add Correctives for each of these activities
Press to add a new Corrective
You can build the charts activity as you wish
Press to add elements to the activity in every moment
Below you will see the Annotations and Labels panel. Drag your finger from the bottom of the screen to display it
When add new Pages, you can move between them dragging your finger horizontally
Now, in the new Page you can add more elements, like Text or Charts
Furthermore, if you press the options button you will can establish a global data collection criteria for the whole page, move the page to the left or to the right, change its title or delete it
With one click in the Chart you will see the summary of the glucose tests represented on it
And if you make a long click the contextual menu will show so you can configure the specific data collection criteria, select what statistical elements represent or to delete it
Annotations are text situated on specific dates. They will be displayed on date type charts. Will serve to know if something you changed made his blood glucose levels were better or worse
Labels are date ranges marked with text. Will serve to discriminate or extract blood glucose levels in these ranges easily to study your diabetes
All this screens can be closed with double click to avoid accidental closes. Please, try it.
Perfect! Let\'s go slowly explaining how Cafydia works
Perfect! We will see all concepts used in this app needed to understand its operation. I Welcome you to Cafydia :-)
Cafydia generates recommendations in the following way:
The preprandial part of the recommendation starts with the Baseline, It\'s a simple linear function that crosses carbohydrates ingested with doses

Later, are applied the active Metabolic Rhythm modifiers. You can define how the doses will be modified over time since the Metabolic Rhythm activation, and/or you can define modifiers that meet specific changes when walking, running, etc (Correctives)
And at the end, the Correction Factor modification if activated and if your glucose level have to be corrected
The basal part of the recommendation, if you are using it in Cafydia, is more simple. Begins with the fixed value entered by hand by you for breakfast, lunch, or dinner in the Baseline menu
And at the end, are applied the Basal Beginnings of the Metabolic Rhythm activated
groups of glucose test before, meal and glucose test after for
